dmca.title: DMCA Notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Rob Hall [mailto:rob@cubed3d.co.uk] 
Sent: Monday, April 10, 2006 12:35 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: DMCA Notice

DMCA Notice to ThePlanet

To whom it may concern,

I am the designer, and administrator of all works found under the domain
www.mygen.co.uk, copyright as intellectual property of MyGen(TM).

My Contact Information:

Residential:
Mr. Robert Hall
33 Warren Road
Addiscombe
Croydon
United Kingdom
0208 405 0817

The copyrighted work being infringed (Used on another website domain other
than mygen.co.uk) includes the graphics, layout, literature, menu options
and scripting. I am requesting that this material be disabled.

The material in question may be found at the following world wide web
addresses, to permit ThePlanet to locate the material.

http://www.myspacehive.com/index.php?page=myspace_layouts&cat_id=1&sub_cat_i
d=6
http://www.myspacehive.com/profile-generator.js

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained
of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or the law.

The information in this notice is accurate, under penalty of perjury. Under
penalty of perjury, I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner
of the infringed works.

Robert Hall

Date: 10/04/2006

----- Original Message -----
From: "Legal Response" <legal-response2@theplanet.com>
To: <rob@cubed3d.co.uk>
Sent: Monday, April 10, 2006 6:11 PM
Subject: FW: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]


> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
> substantially comply with the required notification elements of the 
> Digital
> Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
>
> Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your 
> claim.
>
> Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
>
> Legal Response Team
> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rob Hall [mailto:rob@cubed3d.co.uk]
> Sent: Monday, April 10, 2006 11:39 AM
> To: Legal Response
> Subject: Re: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]
>
> Hi,
>
> I'm not entirely sure I understand this e-mail, are you suggesting that 
> the
> site in question is not actually abusing my copyright?
>
> If you look at the two files in question:
> http://www.myspacehive.com/profile-generator.js
> and
> http://www.mygen.co.uk/JavaScript/create.js
> You will see that besides the obviousl reshuffle, and the addition of
> comments, both files are identical, with identically named functions,
> design, and functionality. Although it is quite evident that someone to
> tried to obsfuscate it to make it look like their own work.
>
> Even the literary work found on the actual HTML pages is identical, for
> these reasons I find it hard to believe that they are not in breach of any
> copyright laws, DMCA or not.
>
> Could you please clarify the original e-mail, and let me know whether 
> action
> will be taken against the offending site?
>
> Many Thanks
> Rob Hall
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Legal Response" <legal-response2@theplanet.com>
> To: <rob@cubed3d.co.uk>
> Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
> Sent: Monday, April 10, 2006 4:57 PM
> Subject: FW: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]
>
>
>> To Whom It May Concern:
>>
>> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
>> substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
>> Digital
>> Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
>>
>> Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
>> claim.
>>
>> Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
>>
>> Legal Response Team
>> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
>> The Planet Policy Enforcement
>> Sent: Sunday, April 09, 2006 8:06 PM
>> To: copyright@theplanet.com; rob@cubed3d.co.uk
>> Subject: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]
>>
>> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
>> Hash: SHA1
>>
>> Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at
>> the
>> address of copyright@theplanet.com.
>>
>> - -------- Original Message --------
>> Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
>> Date: Sun, 9 Apr 2006 20:55:49 +0100
>> From: Rob Hall <rob@cubed3d.co.uk>
>> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
>>
>>
>>
>> Dear owner,
>> It has come to our attention that a customer of yours has knowingly 
>> stolen
>
>> a
>> number of copyrighted materials from my website, www.mygen.co.uk. The
>> offending site (myspacehive.com) contains the following copyrighted
>> materials.
>>
>> Profile Editor (Found here:
>>
>
*http://www.myspacehive.com/index.php?page=myspace_layouts&cat_id=1&sub_cat_
>> id=6*
>>
>
<http://www.myspacehive.com/index.php?page=myspace_layouts&cat_id=1&sub_cat_
>> id=6>
>> )
>>
>> Working examples of this can be viewed at www.mygen.co.uk under similar
>> names.
>>
>> We have attempted to contact the owner via email and telephone, and the
>> owner refuses to cooperate with our demands. Therefore we have had to 
>> come
>> to yourselves, to request that you remove these offending sites
>> immediately.
>> The websites in question receive quite a lot of traffic, and although it
>> is
>> not quite as much as our own, is obviously impacting our reach, and thus
>> our
>> income.
>>
>> Please consider this a matter of upmost urgency, and I look forward to
>> hearing from you soon.
>>
>> Many Thanks
>> Robert Hall
>> MyGen(TM)
>>
>> - --
>> Thanks,
>>
>> Policy Enforcement
>> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
>> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
>> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
>> Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
>> Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
>>
>> iD8DBQFEOa+BvK/XpJs6oyURAhpfAKCfnzvLCsVKrMzO6o5lJNk53D63lQCfUb7i
>> qpKyRyQzt5dcdovoC5+Z9Y0=
>> =io5S
>> -----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
>>
>>
>>
>> -- 
>> No virus found in this incoming message.
>> Checked by AVG Free Edition.
>> Version: 7.1.385 / Virus Database: 268.4.0/306 - Release Date: 4/9/2006
>>
>>
>
>
>
> -- 
> No virus found in this incoming message.
> Checked by AVG Free Edition.
> Version: 7.1.385 / Virus Database: 268.4.0/306 - Release Date: 4/9/2006
>
>
